verbose_text: In accordance with the aforementioned functional experiments, BRD4 silencing significantly decreased the expression of the anti-apoptotic factor Bcl-2, while it enhanced the expression levels of the pro apoptotic factor Bax, cleaved caspase-3 and cleaved PARP in the SW1736 and KAT-18 cell lines (XREF_FIG and B).
evidence: levels of the pro-apoptotic factor Bax
